concept.title: Running plans
concept.shortdesc: can run plans, allowing multiple tasks to be tied together.

conbody.p: To execute a task plan, run bolt plan run, specifying:

li.p: The full name of the plan, formatted as <MODULE>::<PLAN>.
If credentials are required to connect to the target node, pass the username and password with the --user and --password flags.

conbody.p: For example, if a plan defined in mymodule/plans/myplan.pp accepts a load_balancer parameter to specify a load balancer node on which to run the tasks or functions in the plan, run:

Note that, like --nodes, you can pass a comma-separated list of node names, wildcard patterns, or group names to a plan parameter that is passed to a run function or that the plan resolves using get_targets.
